Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Lung Disorder/Respiratory Failure/Respiratory Distress Syndrome,/NCIThesaurus/Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Syndrome/Respiratory Distress Syndrome
